service_identity: INT. (Indus Net Technologies) is a full-stack software engineering solutions company that provides managed services, maintenance, support, project management, and consulting. It focuses on digital transformation for banking and financial services brands, leveraging technology, data, cloud, security, and marketing. The service is designed for organizations seeking innovative solutions to enhance their digital capabilities.
service_capabilities: The service offers a range of capabilities including data engineering, business intelligence, advanced analytics, and digital banking solutions. It emphasizes quick and timely delivery, adaptability, and innovative ideas to meet client needs. The service also includes governance, risk, and compliance management, ensuring reliable results and effective project management.
service_technologies: The technologies used by INT. include data analytics, artificial intelligence, cloud services, and cybersecurity solutions. The company employs advanced technology for counterfeit drug detection and utilizes blockchain for authenticity verification. Specific frameworks or platforms are not mentioned in the document.
service_intent: The primary intent of the service is to drive digital transformation and enhance operational efficiency for clients in the banking and financial sectors. It aims to deliver innovative solutions that meet urgent needs, such as citizen engagement and crisis management. The service exists to provide measurable business value and improve client outcomes through technology and data-driven strategies.
service_problems: INT. addresses several challenges including the need for effective citizen engagement, unifying siloed agencies, and ensuring the authenticity of products in the pharmaceutical industry. The service solves inefficiencies in project management and operational workflows, providing reliable results in a timely manner. It also tackles issues related to crisis management, as demonstrated during the COVID-19 pandemic.
service_industries: The service is applicable primarily in the banking and financial services industries. It also extends to sectors requiring data engineering, business intelligence, and digital marketing solutions. Specific use cases in healthcare, such as pharmaceutical supply chain management, are also mentioned.
service_usecases: INT. developed and launched MyGov within three months to address urgent citizen engagement needs post-inauguration of PM Modi. The company provided Cipla with a dedicated team to unify 15 siloed agencies, ensuring alignment and efficiency. Additionally, it implemented advanced technology for counterfeit drug detection for Zuellig Pharma.
service_figures: INT. has been recognized for triple-digit revenue growth over three years and has received multiple awards for its digital transformation services. The company has over 500 clients and has completed more than 11,000 client projects. It has also been acknowledged as one of the Top 100 SMEs in India and has received over 30 awards in the last two decades.
